channel.title: Confused!
channel.description: Ok so today i decided to make a part of the dual arena safe and it worked!! so i thought hell ill do the same to capes too so people cant attk people buying capes... So i put the code in, and it made the dual arena where u stake not work... meaning u couldnt attack anyone.. so i deleted the capes one and its fixed but the capes is wild again... What did i do wrong?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 21, 2008, 03:23:57 AM[/size][hr]lemme explain this lil better.... I made the cords for the dual arena not in the arena but where the alter is and bank... I made that area safe... So i did the same to the capes area, and that made the capes area safe.. But the arena where people fite is safe as well.. so i had to delete the capes cords. now u can attack in the arena but the u can also attack in the capes are (where u buy skill capes) should i just move the capes somewhere else or does someone have a solution>?

item.title: Confused!
item.dc:creator: @x0_0wn x0 0wn
item.description:
@x0_0wn wrote:

You’ve mucked up your coords.

Read full topic

item.title: Confused!
item.dc:creator: @bhpkyeah satesql
item.description:
@bhpkyeah wrote:

Ok so today i decided to make a part of the dual arena safe and it worked!! so i thought hell ill do the same to capes too so people cant attk people buying capes… So i put the code in, and it made the dual arena where u stake not work… meaning u couldnt attack anyone… so i deleted the capes one and its fixed but the capes is wild again… What did i do wrong?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 21, 2008, 03:23:57 AM[/size][hr]lemme explain this lil better… I made the cords for the dual arena not in the arena but where the alter is and bank… I made that area safe… So i did the same to the capes area, and that made the capes area safe… But the arena where people fite is safe as well… so i had to delete the capes cords. now u can attack in the arena but the u can also attack in the capes are (where u buy skill capes) should i just move the capes somewhere else or does someone have a solution>?
